title: Participant Risk Calculation Response
description: Operational limit calculation details for a participant, including participant identification, trade date, trigger information, individual components, and the total consolidated value.

triggerResult.description: Details of the trigger result for the risk position, including the margin run ID, timestamp, and calculation type.

participantIdentification.description: Provides details about the participant identification.

tradeDate.description: Trade date associated with the operational limit calculation, in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

intradayRiskLimitAssigned.description: Intraday risk limit assigned to the intermediary full or settlement participant.

operationalLimitCollateral.description: Collateral value deposited to cover the intraday risk exposure of the intermediary full or settlement participant.

riskExposure.description: Intraday risk exposure calculated for the intermediary full or settlement participant.

nonAllocatedRisk.description: Portion of the intraday risk exposure that has not yet been allocated.

residualRiskInvestor.description: Residual risk per investor after all applicable allocations.

additionalMargin.description: Additional margin required to cover the residual exposure.

operationalLimit.description: Total operational limit calculated as the sum of all related risk components.
